reviews.review:
O kadar saat oynamisligim var 1500 saat civari. Hala hile sorununu cozemediler. Bunu cozemedikce bi halt olmaz bu oyundan. Bosuna sinir ediyo milleti. O kadar emek emek rekabetci kas 2 hile gelsin butun emek bosa gitsin. ve bu hile her 2-3 macta bir kesin geliyor. Bi yazilim gelistiremediler arka planda baska hic bir uygulama calistirmiyacak bi sistem.

Never play unless they solve the cheating problem. There are a lot of cheaters on competetive mode and valve is not taking any steps against the cheaters. All gained ranks are going down due to the cheaters and it is a hundred percent to see a cheater within 2 or 3 competetive match.

TLDR : THIS GAME SUCKS REALLY BAD, ENJOY LOSING TO CHEATERS! Yeah.. if valve put even 1% of the energy into developing an effective anti-cheat as they do into stupid cases and pointless skins you might actually have a decent playable game, but instead you will go up against a hacker every 3 games or so, regardless of prime status. I recommend playing Valorant or any other FPS over this flaming hot piece of garbage game.
